ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds very ripe strawberries, hulled and cut into chunks

cookingTips: Use very ripe strawberries for maximum flavor and natural sweetness
Simmer berries gently to avoid breaking down pectin and clouding the syrup
Strain through fine mesh or cheesecloth for clear, smooth syrup
